20101214161813.500|20101214161816.000|CCO|>> Reporter: MY MOM, 86 YEARS 
20101214161816.000|20101214161818.500|CCO|YOUNG, AND I SAT DOWN WITH 
20101214161818.500|20101214161821.000|CCO|AUTHOR, MISSY BUCHANAN, WHO

20101214161835.286|20101214161836.714|CCO|EXPERIENCES THAT A CHILD DOES

20101214161841.000|20101214161842.667|CCO|TAKE ON MORE RESPONSIBILITIES OR
